faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the AI trading bot work?
faq.a1: Our AI trading bot uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze market trends, news, and historical data to make informed trading decisions 24/7.
faq.a2: Yes, we use bank-grade security measures including encryption, two-factor authentication, and blockchain verification for all transactions.
faq.a3: The minimum investment varies by plan, starting from $100 for our Starter plan.
faq.q4: How do I withdraw my earnings?
faq.a4: You can withdraw your earnings at any time through your dashboard. Withdrawals are processed within 24 hours.
faq.a5: We currently support USDT (Tether) and Bitcoin for deposits and withdrawals.

footer.description: Professional cryptocurrency trading platform powered by advanced AI algorithms.
footer.riskWarning: Trading cryptocurrencies involves significant risk and may not be suitable for all investors. Past performance is not indicative of future results.
